context.algorithm:
<.link navigate={~p"/custom_rules"} class="btn btn-ghost btn-sm"> <.icon name="hero-arrow-left" class="w-4 h-4" /> Back to Custom Rules

{@page_title}

<.form for={@form} phx-change="validate" phx-submit="save" class="space-y-6">

Rule Details

<.input field={@form[:name]} type="text" placeholder="e.g., Check for TODO comments" />
<.input field={@form[:language]} type="select" options={[ {"Elixir", "elixir"}, {"Python", "python"}, {"JavaScript", "javascript"}, {"TypeScript", "typescript"}, {"Go", "go"}, {"Ruby", "ruby"}, {"Rust", "rust"} ]} />
<.input field={@form[:severity]} type="select" options={[{"Error", "error"}, {"Warning", "warning"}, {"Info", "info"}]} />
<.input field={@form[:category]} type="text" placeholder="e.g., code_quality, security, style" />
<.input field={@form[:description]} type="textarea" placeholder="Brief description of what this rule checks" />

Command Configuration

<.input field={@form[:command]} type="textarea" placeholder="e.g., grep -r 'TODO' ." rows="4" />
<.icon name="hero-exclamation-triangle" class="w-6 h-6" />
Security Warning
Custom commands run in isolated Docker containers. Avoid commands that could be destructive or access sensitive data.
<.link navigate={~p"/custom_rules"} class="btn btn-ghost"> Cancel

context.algorithm:
<%!-- Hero Section --%>

Automate Your Code Quality Audits

Catch bugs early, enforce standards, and maintain high code quality across 5 languages with real-time feedback

Isolated Docker containers. GitHub webhooks. Custom rules. Side-by-side comparisons. Everything you need to keep your codebase clean.

<%= if @current_user do %> <.link navigate="/repositories" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg"> <.icon name="hero-folder" class="w-5 h-5" /> Go to Repositories <% else %> <.icon name="hero-arrow-right" class="w-5 h-5" /> Get Started Free <% end %>
<%!-- Quick Stats --%>
5
Languages
3
UI Languages
100%
Open Source
<%!-- Features Section --%>

Everything You Need

Comprehensive code quality tools built for modern development teams

<.icon name="hero-shield-check" class="w-16 h-16 text-primary mb-4" />

Automated Audits

Run comprehensive code quality checks automatically on every commit or manually trigger audits when needed.

<.icon name="hero-cube" class="w-16 h-16 text-secondary mb-4" />

Docker Isolation

Each audit runs in an isolated Docker container, ensuring consistent and secure code analysis across environments.

<.icon name="hero-language" class="w-16 h-16 text-accent mb-4" />

Multi-Language Support

Automatic language detection with support for Elixir, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, and more coming soon.

<.icon name="hero-bolt" class="w-16 h-16 text-warning mb-4" />

Real-time Progress

Track audit progress in real-time with live updates showing current phase, language being analyzed, and completion percentage.

<.icon name="hero-document-text" class="w-16 h-16 text-info mb-4" />

Detailed Reports

Get comprehensive markdown reports with findings categorized by severity, including file locations and line numbers.

<.icon name="hero-cog-6-tooth" class="w-16 h-16 text-error mb-4" />

Custom Rules

Create and manage custom audit rules through an intuitive UI. Define your own standards and enforce team conventions.

<.icon name="hero-arrow-path" class="w-16 h-16 text-success mb-4" />

Webhook Integration

Automatically trigger audits on every push with GitHub webhooks. Keep your code quality in check continuously.

<.icon name="hero-arrows-right-left" class="w-16 h-16 text-primary mb-4" />

Audit Comparison

Compare audits side-by-side to track code quality improvements over time. See what issues were fixed or introduced.

<.icon name="hero-globe-alt" class="w-16 h-16 text-secondary mb-4" />

Multilingual

Interface available in English, Spanish, and Catalan. More languages coming soon.

<%!-- Supported Languages Section --%>

Supported Languages

<.icon name="hero-code-bracket" class="w-4 h-4" /> Elixir
<.icon name="hero-code-bracket" class="w-4 h-4" /> Python
<.icon name="hero-code-bracket" class="w-4 h-4" /> JavaScript
<.icon name="hero-code-bracket" class="w-4 h-4" /> TypeScript
<.icon name="hero-code-bracket" class="w-4 h-4" /> Go
<.icon name="hero-code-bracket" class="w-4 h-4" /> Rust (Coming Soon)
<.icon name="hero-code-bracket" class="w-4 h-4" /> Ruby (Coming Soon)

More languages coming soon. Request support for your favorite language!

<%!-- How It Works Section --%>

How It Works

1

Connect Your Repository

Sign in with GitHub and add your repository. Oeditus automatically detects the languages in your project.

2

Run Automated Audits

Trigger audits manually or set up webhooks for automatic checks on every push. Watch real-time progress as your code is analyzed.

3

Review & Improve

Get detailed reports with actionable findings. Compare audits over time and track your code quality improvements.

<%!-- Sample Results Section --%>

See It in Action

Errors
3
Warnings
12
Info
8

Function has high cyclomatic complexity (12). Consider refactoring.

WARNING Design credo/module-doc

Module is missing documentation. Add @moduledoc to describe its purpose.

Consider using an alias for frequently used module.

lib/my_app/controller.ex:23
<%!-- Call to Action Section --%>

Ready to Improve Your Code Quality?

Get started in seconds with your GitHub account.

<%= if @current_user do %> <.link navigate="/repositories" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg"> <.icon name="hero-folder" class="w-5 h-5" /> Go to Repositories <% else %> <.icon name="hero-lock-closed" class="w-5 h-5" /> Sign in with GitHub <% end %>
